name: SOULSSHINE Crystal Legends
description:
The Biggest FANTASY Open World Fighting RPG in CORE

Fight Flying Across the Skies
In A Extasic Experience within a Astonishing Beautifully Ethereal 
Incredible 1500 Kilometres Level !

_______________________

This is a 5 days Work and ...
FIRST TIME USING CORE  

-----------------------------------------

PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE CORE PROJECT MAP FILES BELLOW !
We Uploaded the 1GB Project Map Files in this page 
In Case the CORE Level is Not published ...  

We Gone to the Limits of What Core Can do ...

iT WORKS ON OUR END ...
But the Core Online Server refuses to Accept it ?

The Project is Playable if you Put the Files at Your CORE installation
C:\Users\USER\Documents\My Games\CORE\Saved\Maps
